classes.name: Swordmaster
strengths: Blade Barrier (E): +30% attack speed and frontal block for 3s
Counter-Guard: next hit deals +30% damage after a block
Duelist: +15% sword speed and armor penetration in 1v1
weaknesses: Duelist bonus only when no enemies within 5 blocks

classes.name: Assassin
strengths: Shadow Step (E): 8-block dash, invulnerable during dash
Backstab: hits from behind crit for 150% to 200% damage
Venomous: 3 consecutive dagger hits poison for 5s
weaknesses: Venomous requires 3 consecutive hits on the same target

classes.name: Mace Bearer
strengths: Armor Breaker: mace hits ignore 25% of enemy armor
Splash Damage: normal attacks deal 30% splash within 2 blocks
Heavy melee specialist for armored targets
weaknesses: Bonuses require a mace weapon equipped
Splash damage is limited to a 2-block radius

classes.name: Berserker
strengths: Primal Roar (E): 1s stun and attack speed boost
Bloodlust: damage increases with missing HP
Executioner: double damage to targets below 30% HP
weaknesses: Power peaks at low HP (high risk)
Executioner only triggers under 30% target HP

classes.name: Archer
strengths: Evasive Shot (E): backflip + 3-arrow fan + knockback
Longshot: +1% damage per block traveled
Hawkeye: headshots guarantee +60% crit when fully drawn
weaknesses: Longshot deals less damage at close range
Fully drawn bow reduces movement speed

classes.name: Paladin
strengths: Radiance (E): heals allies and slows enemies
Dawnbreaker (R): blinds, burns, and shields allies
Strong area support tools

classes.name: Mage
strengths: Void Rift (E): pulls enemies to the center
Arcane Torrent (R): invulnerable while casting
Strong control and burst windows
weaknesses: Rooted in place during Arcane Torrent

classes.name: Gunslinger
strengths: Flashbang (E): stuns and breaks armor
Lead Storm (R): 360-degree close-range AoE
Strong burst around targets
weaknesses: Needs close range to maximize Lead Storm

classes.name: Spearman
strengths: Whirlwind (E): knockback and deflects projectiles
Thunderfall (R): spear throw, lightning, teleport
Strong melee control and reposition
weaknesses: Requires timing and spacing to land the spear
